content: Magazine Auction3 Magazines up for auction as 1 Lot - grab some Bitcoin history  Magazines are :1.New Scientist 4th June 2011Contains article mentioning Bitcoin - “Virtual Money Gets Real”2.new Scientist 14th June 2012Article- “Bitcoin Rises Again”3.Bitcoin Magazine- 10 yr Anniversary Edition All magazines are in excellent conditionAll info available here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.140Thanks to Crypto_CollectionAUCTION TERMSBidding in BTC only Starting bid 0.0025BTC Min bid increments 0.0001BTCEnd Time - Sunday 30th OCTOBER (Edit)  at 7pm GMTSniping - any bid made in the last 10 mins, will increase the auction time by 10 mins from that last bid , eg, if a  bid comes in at 6.57 , the New end time will be 7.07 . Postage and shipping is FREE!I will reach out to the winner via pm with all relevant details . Careful of scammers. Check all links - I will only PM after the auction has ended and ONLY if you win. Escrow paid by the buyer .Thanks to all forum members whose auction templates I’ve borrowed/ stolen/ bastardised- too many to mention.
